00153 struct AnyVarRef_Abstract
00154 {
00155   virtual BOOL isBound() const = 0;
00156   virtual BOOL isAssigned() const = 0;  
00157   virtual DomainInt getAssignedValue() const = 0;
00158   virtual BOOL isAssignedValue(DomainInt i) const = 0;

00163   virtual DomainInt getInitialMax() const = 0;

00166   virtual void setMin(DomainInt i) = 0;

00174   virtual DomainInt getBaseVal(DomainInt) const = 0;

00187   virtual void addDynamicTrigger(DynamicTrigger* t, TrigType type, DomainInt pos = NoDomainValue BT_FUNDEF) = 0;
00188 };

00291 class AnyVarRef
00292 {
00293 public:
00294   static const BOOL isBool = false;
00295   static const BoundType isBoundConst = Bound_Maybe;
00296   shared_ptr<AnyVarRef_Abstract> data;
00297   
00298   BOOL isBound() const
00299   { return data->isBound();}
00300   
00301   template<typename VarRef>
00302     AnyVarRef(const VarRef& _data) 
00303   { data = shared_ptr<AnyVarRef_Abstract>(new AnyVarRef_Concrete<VarRef>(_data)); }
00304   
00305   AnyVarRef() 
00306   {}
00307   
00308   AnyVarRef(const AnyVarRef& b) : data(b.data)
00309   {}
00310   
00311   BOOL isAssigned() const
00312   { return data->isAssigned(); }
00313   
00314   DomainInt getAssignedValue() const
00315   { return data->getAssignedValue(); }
00316   
00317   BOOL isAssignedValue(DomainInt i) const
00318   { 
00319     return data->isAssigned() &&
00320     data->getAssignedValue() == i;
00321   }
00322   
00323   BOOL inDomain(DomainInt b) const
00324   { return data->inDomain(b); }
00325 
00326   BOOL inDomain_noBoundCheck(DomainInt b) const
00327   { return data->inDomain_noBoundCheck(b); }
00328   
00329   DomainInt getMax() const
00330   { return data->getMax(); }
00331   
00332   DomainInt getMin() const
00333   { return data->getMin(); }
00334 
00335   DomainInt getInitialMax() const
00336   { return data->getInitialMax(); }
00337   
00338   DomainInt getInitialMin() const
00339   { return data->getInitialMin(); }
00340   
00341   void setMax(DomainInt i)
00342   { data->setMax(i); }
00343   
00344   void setMin(DomainInt i)
00345   { data->setMin(i); }
00346   
00347   void uncheckedAssign(DomainInt b)
00348   { data->uncheckedAssign(b); }
00349   
00350   void propagateAssign(DomainInt b)
00351   { data->propagateAssign(b); }
00352   
00353   void decisionAssign(DomainInt b)
00354   { data->decisionAssign(b); }
00355   
00356   void removeFromDomain(DomainInt b)
00357   { data->removeFromDomain(b); }
00358 
00359   void addTrigger(Trigger t, TrigType type)
00360   { data->addTrigger(t, type); }
00361 
00362   vector<AbstractConstraint*>* getConstraints() 
00363   { return data->getConstraints(); }
00364 
00365   void addConstraint(AbstractConstraint* c)
00366   { data->addConstraint(c); }
00367 
00368   DomainInt getBaseVal(DomainInt v) const
00369   { return data->getBaseVal(v); }
00370

00372   { return data->getBaseVar(); }

00379   { data->incWdeg(); }
00380 #endif
00381   
00382   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const AnyVarRef& avr)
00383   { return o << "AnyVarRef:" << avr.data->virtual_to_string(); }
